line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.3: upcoming insane mode increases spawns by 40% flat from hard mode (30% more compared to hard mode).
* Add-Ons 1.2: Handle dynamic jump beacon and jump station cap after starting options are done, scaled based on the number of sectors in the galaxy (100 sectors is base, same as small galaxy).
* The base minimums on easy/normal/hard are 4 for jump stations and 6 for jump beacons.
* Insane difficulty applies a 25% reduction after the base clamp.
* If we're less than the minimums, clamp again.

sval.val: Add-Ons 1.3: upcoming insane mode increases spawns by 40% flat from hard mode (30% more compared to hard mode).
Add-Ons 1.2: Handle dynamic jump beacon and jump station cap after starting options are done, scaled based on the number of sectors in the galaxy (100 sectors is base, same as small galaxy).
The base minimums on easy/normal/hard are 4 for jump stations and 6 for jump beacons.
Insane difficulty applies a 25% reduction after the base clamp.
If we're less than the minimums, clamp again.
